### Continuous

1. $f(x) = 2x; 0 < x < 1$

1. $f(x) = ax^2; 0 < x < 4$
1. $f(x) = kx^2 + kx + \frac 18; 0 < x < 8$
1. $f(x) = kx; 0 < x < 4$
